title: Red Lobster restaurants in the U.S. and Canada 2013
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of restaurants, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely negative which exists from 2008 to 2013.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely negative which exists from 2000 to 2004.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2004 to 2006.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2006 to 2008.
gold: The statistic shows the number of Red Lobster restaurants in the United States and Canada from 2000 to 2013 . In 2013 , there were 705 Red Lobster restaurants in North America .
